trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Girard
There were no other sightings in Girard on or around June 24th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in living room when i noticed bright orange light. We bolted outside and were amazed. This bright sphere waznt pulsating at first, then it started pulsating and not to long after it simply went out....it was gone...disappeared. it also flew quick...but NOT meteor quick. It was amazing......it was silent as well......this is my second siting in less than a year.....what is going on?
